meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the October 10, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, the October 24, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, and the November 7, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Development Plans
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Tract 13A - MF-2(A) within Planned Development District No. 508.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Planned Development Subdistrict for an art or craft production facility use.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a new Planned Development District for WR-3 Walkable Urban Residential uses.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2419 for a community service center.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a restaurant.

agenda_items.title: Special Provision Sign District
agenda_items.description: An application to create a new subdistrict, Lawyers Building, within the West End Historic Sign District.

agenda_items.title: Authorized Hearings - Zoning Case
agenda_items.description: A City Plan Commission authorized hearing seeking a recommendation regarding a proposal to change the zoning classification.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Cases - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application to revise a previously approved preliminary plat to create 8 lots.
